venue.name: Appleton Chapel, The Memorial Church Harvard University

item.description:
The American Australian Association and KEA
invite members and friends to attend
a service of remembrance to commemorate

Anzac Day

Reception to follow at Robinson Hall, Harvard University,
where guests are welcome to bring a plate to share.

Please register to assist with chapel seating numbers.(https://www.americanaustralian.org/en/cev/reg/1095/)


Generously sponsored by the
Harvard University Committee on Australian Studies.

Â

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: ANZAC Day in New England
